name: Forsworn
description:
Arrow Keys, WASD, or swipe for movement (Quick restart button in upper corner)

-Whenever you move, you attack!

-Become anything! Defeat enemies and learn their abilities!

-Three different characters to start with!

This is an early build, about a month in development

Have fun, let me know if you beat level 9!

-------------------

Heavily inspired by Megaman Battle Network, Into the breach, and Downwell
